resources.string: 1) \n Is there a physical cause that fully explains the presenting symptoms?

string-array.name: OTH_Ass_Yes
string-array.item: 1) \n Is there a physical cause that fully explains the presenting symptoms?
- Manage any physical cause identified and recheck to see if the symptoms persist.
OTHER SIGNIFICANT MENTAL HEALTH COMPLAINTS are likely.
OTHER SIGNIFICANT MENTAL HEALTH COMPLAINTS are likely \n 4 \n Has the person been exposed to extreme stressors? (e.g. physical or sexual violence, major accidents, bereavement or other major losses)

string-array.name: OTH_Ass_No
string-array.item: 2) \n Is this depression or another MNS condition discussed in another module of this guide?
3) \n Is the person seeking help to relieve symptoms or having considerable difficulty with daily functioning because of their symptoms?

resources.string: ASSESS FOR IMPROVEMENT \n Is the person improving?

string-array.name: OTH_FollowUp_Yes
string-array.item: ASSESS FOR IMPROVEMENT \n Is the person improving?
- Contine with treatment plan \n - Follow-up as needed

string-array.name: OTH_FollowUp_No
string-array.item:
If the person is not improving or the person or the carer insists on further investigations and treatment: 
 - Review Protocols 1 and 2 
 - Consider consulting a specialist
